4.4.2 Trace

unbreakpoint

Function

Structure

Shell.Trace

Type

val unbreakpoint: string -> unit

Syntax

unbreakpoint name -> ()

Arguments

name
A string.

Values

()

Description

Removes breakpoint from the function named name. Breakpoints are also removed from all functions with identifiers starting with name.
